user_query: I'm a teacher and I want to organize a field trip for my students.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of educational places to visit in the city suitable for students.
Gather information on interactive activities available at the selected educational places to enhance the students' learning experience.
Find and evaluate transportation services that can accommodate a large group of students for the field trip.
Compare the recommendations for educational places, activities, and transport services, then finalize the field trip plan.
